description: Show the full details of a maintenance requirement part link.
permissions: Allowed when the user can view the related maintenance requirement part per MaintenanceRequirementPartPolicy (same access rules as list: admin; managers can view all parts for broker; technicians can view all non-template parts and template parts for their broker; general business unit members can view template parts for their broker and parts on assigned requirements; operations members can view non-template parts with equipment in accessible business units, and operations-with-manager-business-unit cannot view template parts).
